text: Hulaŋ 4.36 HJL 11.22-26, 13.2-3 mu avi haiabɨla heŋ hɨniadami. Nudɨ ibi Josepɨ. Hulaŋ Jisasɨ lɨbɨmɨŋami agɨlaŋ nudɨ ibi mu lamavɨla abavɨmi. Banabasɨ uavɨmi. Iagaŋ lagulagu hɨsɨŋ hulaŋ aba abavɨhadami agasaŋ Alam ciaŋ hɨvɨ Banabasɨ uavɨhadami. Banabasɨ nɨbu Livai hɨdɨlɨ. Nɨbu Saipɨlusɨ avɨli muha hɨsɨŋ.
